name: The Sea of Madness

objectives.desc: Investigate tales of a ghost fleet off the coast.
Brave the radioactive waters to reach the derelict ships.
Search the abandoned vessels for valuable pre-War technology.
Discover the lone sailor who's lived here for 200 years.
Decide what to do with the fleet and its guardian.

stages.desc: Hear tales of the ghost fleet.
Meet the last man of the war.

mad_sailor_profile.name: Captain Marcus "Eternal" Hayes
mad_sailor_profile.beliefs: War never ended, still defending against Chinese invasion
mad_sailor_profile.condition: Sustained by radiation, fish, and delusion
mad_sailor_profile.lucidity: Brief moments of clarity reveal deep loneliness

fleet_contents.treasure: Pre-War naval technology, weapons, nuclear codes
fleet_contents.dangers: Mirelurk kings, radiated sharks, submarine ghosts

help_sailor_peace.desc: Help the sailor find peace by showing him the war is over.

consequences.outcome: You gently show him the truth. He weeps. Then smiles. His war is over. He dies peacefully. The fleet is yours.

take_over_fleet.desc: Claim the fleet for yourself, dealing with creatures and sailor.

consequences.outcome: You conquer the sea. The fleet is your fortress. Sea trade is yours to control. Captain Hayes is imprisoned or killed.

befriend_sailor.desc: Befriend the sailor, letting him believe you're his new crew.

consequences.outcome: You play along. He's happy. You gain a loyal (if insane) companion and naval expert. The fleet remains his.

destroy_creatures.desc: Clear out the mutant sea creatures and salvage everything.

consequences.outcome: Creatures dead. Waters safer. Massive salvage. But the sailor dies defending his 'post.' His war truly ends.

notes: Emotional quest about war's lasting trauma. Unique ghoul NPC. Naval base can become major player asset.
